# Architecture Decision Records (ADR)

**Project:** BRS-KB (BRS XSS Knowledge Base)  
**Version:** 2.0.0  
**Date:** 2025-10-25

## Overview

This directory contains Architecture Decision Records (ADRs) documenting important architectural decisions made during the development of BRS-KB.

## ADR Index

- [ADR-001: Modular Context Architecture](./ADR-001-modular-context-architecture.md)
- [ADR-002: In-Memory Payload Database](./ADR-002-in-memory-payload-database.md)
- [ADR-003: LRU Caching for Reverse Mapping](./ADR-003-lru-caching.md)
- [ADR-004: Structured JSON Logging](./ADR-004-structured-json-logging.md)
- [ADR-005: Custom Exception Hierarchy](./ADR-005-custom-exception-hierarchy.md)
- [ADR-006: Input Validation Module](./ADR-006-input-validation-module.md)
- [ADR-007: Payload Indexing System](./ADR-007-payload-indexing.md)
- [ADR-008: Base Class for Contexts](./ADR-008-base-context-class.md)

## ADR Format

Each ADR follows this structure:

1. **Status** - Proposed, Accepted, Deprecated, Superseded
2. **Context** - The issue motivating this decision
3. **Decision** - The change that we're proposing or have agreed to implement
4. **Consequences** - What becomes easier or more difficult to do and any risks introduced
